EmailTemplate.name: PCN Notify Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: EOL {!PCN_EOL__c.PCN_Numbers__c} entitled “Title of PCN” - Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
You will be affected by EOL {!PCN_EOL__c.PCN_Numbers__c}.You may access the EOL PCN from Global Foundry View (GFV).
Instructions:
1.Click on this link to review the PCN: {!PCN_EOL__c.Customer_Link__c}{!PCN_EOL__c.Id} Note: If you are not yet logged on to GFV, simply enter User ID and Password in the space provided, and then click on Sign-in.) 2. Review the PCN. 3. Go to the Feed option on top, enter your comments and click Share.
Thank you,
GlobalFoundries
